sentences.sContent: I authorise Immigration New Zealand to provide information about my health and my immigration status to any health service agency.
sentences.sContent_eng: I authorise Immigration New Zealand to provide information about my health and my immigration status to any health service agency.
sentences.sCn: 我授权新西兰移民局可于任何时间将本人健康情况及移民身份提供给任何相关的医疗机构。

synos.tran: 授权；批准；允许；委任（等于authorize）

trans.tranCn: 批准， 认可； 授权
